description.en: Smart PVR for newsgroup and bittorrent users

steps.content:
services:
  server:
    image: linuxserver/sonarr:4.0.16
    restart: on-failure
    ports:
    - 8989:8989
    volumes:
    - ${APP_DATA_DIR}/data/config:/config
    - ${DATA_DIR}/storage/downloads:/downloads
    environment:
    - PUID=1000
    - PGID=1000
  mac:
    image: getumbrel/media-app-configurator:v1.3.0
    restart: on-failure
    volumes:
    - ${APP_DATA_DIR}/data/config:/config
    - ${DATA_DIR}/storage/downloads:/downloads
    environment:
      APP_ID: sonarr
      APP_URL: http://sonarr_server_1:8989
      TRANSMISSION_HOST: transmission_server_1
      TRANSMISSION_PORT: '9091'
      ROOT_FOLDER: /downloads/shows
      QBITTORRENT_INSTALLED: ${APP_SONARR_QBITTORRENT_INSTALLED:-"false"}
      QBITTORRENT_HOST: qbittorrent_server_1
      QBITTORRENT_PORT: '8080'
      SABNZBD_INSTALLED: ${APP_SONARR_SABNZBD_INSTALLED:-"false"}
      SABNZBD_HOST: sabnzbd_web_1
      SABNZBD_PORT: '8080'
      SABNZBD_API_KEY: ${APP_SONARR_SABNZBD_API_KEY:-""}
    user: 1000:1000

en.description: Smart PVR for newsgroup and bittorrent users
